column1: Uchi////Amazing vegetarian selection. Even my family members who usually dislike any kind of Asian food enjoyed Uchi. Try the vegetarian sampler meal- absolutely fantastic. Make sure not to miss dessert
column2: the fried milk is delicious. Appreciated the complementary valet
column3: and the staff were super accommodating during our wait as well as during dinner. Overall had a wonderful time and will be coming back again.
